citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
At the time of the inspection, the records required to be maintained by the AWA could not be located for review by the
APHIS official. These included, the consultant arrangements with the attending veterinarian, the facility's contingency plan
and records of sales for hedgehogs. Per this regulation, these required records must be maintained and provided to
APHIS officials during the inspection process.
Correct by: Dec 17, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
At the time of the inspection, the records required to be maintained by the AWA could not be located for review by the 
APHIS official. These included, the consultant arrangements with the attending veterinarian, the facility's contingency plan 
and records of sales for hedgehogs. Per this regulation, these required records must be maintained and provided to 
APHIS officials during the inspection process.  
Correct by: Dec 17, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
